data.introduce: 客票挂起服务是中国航信在线分销平台统一解决方案中专为在线分销代理人定制的电子客票产品，以便捷、准确的方式满足代理人在线更改电子客票挂起状态的需求。
data.business:
挂起接口只对”open for use”状态的票号进行挂起。
用户传入票号、Office号，对票号进行挂起操作。
用户传入PNR号、office号、出票日期，进行挂起操作。
请熟记挂起使用的配置（office号、工作号），解挂必须使用与挂起同样的配置方可解挂。
data.functions:
对“OPEN FOR USE”状态的票号进行挂起操作。
对“OFFICE+单张票号”进行挂起操作。
对“OFFIC+PNR号+出票日期”进行挂起操作。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketSuspendRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"电子客票挂起请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"公司代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"eTicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"电子票号","children":[]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号上下文","children":[]}]},{"name":"issueDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出票日期","children":[]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"C","description":"BC系统","children":[]}]}]
